title: Zz'rot Changes

replies.body: i actually feel bad for you. like i never build it. but thats pretty harsh
I may be wrong but what you're perceiving as a faster decay rate is actually decreased void spawn health across the board.  I'd double check that.
no its actually both a decreased void spawn health and a faster decay rate

I read the patch notes.

> VOIDSPAWN HEALTH DECAY: OLD 10% current health every 0.25 seconds â‡’ NEW 20% current health every 0.25 seconds

With the changes, it feels like a waste of gold to buy it now. Building damage would be more versatile because you could at least use it in team fights. The portal is killed in just five hits and 90% of its strategies were destroyed by these changes.
Yeahhhh, it looks like garbage now. Haven't used it yet but watching sirchez's stream and the range is pathetic.

They nerfed it specifically because of the interaction of people leaving it under their tower and that lane becoming unsiegeable except by diving it to take out the 'Rot.

If they get a wave to tower through you backing/missing a wave,
I think they should be rewarded and able to hit the tower a bit.

It needed a nerf, the item was just way to damn good. It allowed games to either stall out longer or end faster with an extra minion defending waves so the team could group while still providing gold to the player who is grouping, forcing objectives and jungle camp theft.

If a top laner goes bot or dragon/etc, the opposing top laner needs to respond and if they don't have a zz'rot 1st or cant get one because it compromises their build/etc and they possibly fall behind gold for failing to win a fight and lose objectives to a larger team grouped.

I love the rot but at the same time. That item is aids on certain champs that work well with it. Take Udyr jungle, this items gives him insane speed near towers and a free gold with his Void minions killing minions while he ganks, then forcing an objective after a successful gank while also gaining gold from another lane as the minion delivers gold. An Udyr on a tower is not something to ignore, but the thing is you need so much cc and damage and even if you push him off a tower u just left cs to defend a tower and possibly didn't even kill him.
